Title: Provides for temporary exemptions to educational institutions from certain requirements related to the multi-occupancy bathrooms and locker rooms; and authorizes funding for related improvements
Summary: Provides for temporary exemptions to educational institutions from certain requirements related to the use of multi-occupancy bathrooms and locker rooms; authorizes the use of state building aid for related facility improvements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to providing for temporary exemptions to educational institutions from certain requirements related to the use of multi-occupancy bathrooms and locker rooms and to authorizing the use of state building aid for related facility improvements
